head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GIBBONS, JAMES E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GIBBONS, JAMES E.

block.p: GIBBONS--James E. of Garden City, on March 31, 2007. Loving husband of the late Eleanor. Beloved father of Kathryn McGrath, Mary Ellen Pearson, Cynthia Gibbons and Anne Mah. Also survived by seven loving grandchildren. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Ave. at 12th Street, Garden City, 2-4 and 79pm, Tuesday. Mass of Christian burial St. Joseph's Church, Garden City, Wednesday 10am. In lieu of flowers donations to the American Diabetes Association appreciated.
